name: The Old Mill
description:
I hear tales of a drunken skeleton waiting by that there old mill. How the east wind brings folks to discover what transpired there so long ago. Something unwholesome happened in that old mill. Yes, something unwholesome indeed.

Discover the tale of the old mill, through the eyes of an imaginative child. Let the winds be your guide as you fly through these here parts. Many have failed to travel through these rock plains. But, if you can keep your wits about you, and after a few more tries, you just may make it. And if you happen see that skeleton, well you have to see that for yourself.

Showcase in MAGFest Indie Videogame Showcase (MIVS)

http://magfest.org/mivsentry/the-old-mill/
